turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order pizzas from Bella Luna, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order four large pizzas, all four thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One of them, can I get a meat lovers pizza, extra bacon and sausage? The second one, can I get a veggie-lover pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: My third one, can I get Hawaiian pizza with extra ham and pepperoni Pineapple, sorry. And the fourth one, can I get a cheese pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $100, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will be picking up the pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your receipt will be texted to you and your pizzas will be ready in 40 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much. I appreciate your help.
